divs: Sighting DetailsI witnessed the stationary lights at around 11:30 pm and they stayed for around two hours. I called people in Irvine, CA and Laguna Beach, CA they also saw the lights in the direction of L.A. from their location. I was at my house in Victorville, outside and looking towards the mountains. I thought it might be a satellite, but it the lights were not white. The object (lights) seemed stationary.
Summary: Greenish/Blue lights in a triangular pattern hovering stationary in the sky in the direction of and over Los Angeles (Southwest of Victorville)
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Victorville
There were no other sightings in Victorville on or around March 15th 2010
